Problem statement:
 Build a platform supported on a single column. Materials:
 • Popsicle sticks
 • Adhesive (fevicol)
 • Thread
 • Cutter

Rules:
 • No restriction to the shape of the column.
 • Maximum sectional area of the column 9000 Sqmm.
 • The platform should be supported by only one column.
 • The platform should not be supported with any structural member except the column.
 • The height of the column should be between 350mm to 450mm.
 • The thickness of the platform should be in the between 50mm to 100mm.
 The maximum area of footing for the column should be 93000 sqmm
 • The floor area of the platform constructed should be minimum of 120000 Sqmm.
 • Make sure that there would be no vertical projections on top of platform since it would not accommodate the testing of structure.
 • A team could consist maximum of 4 members.
 • All teams shall construct their model under the surveillance of event Coordinators.
 Judgement:
 • The maximum carrying load of the structure is measured as w1.
 • The weight of the model is measured as w2.
 • If any member of the model is failed, w1 is taken as the load at that failure point.
